availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jane W. Patton Stone Marshall (Pendleton County, KY, resident)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Daughter of John Patton and Joanna Patton. Married to George Stone in Harrison County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1854. Mother of Robert H. Stone. Married to George P. Marshall in Pendleton County in Falmouth, Kentucky, on April 28, 1860. Resident of Pendleton County in 1850. Resident of Pendleton County in 1860. Resident of Pendleton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
